title: Rugby Union football
creator_credit: Town and Country Productions and Bill Latto
brief_description: A description of the fundamental principles of the game of Rugby Union Football. Filmed at Twickenham with the clubs of Richmond and Rosslyn Park, this is a visual explanation of the laws and the skills of the game in a manner which will be helpful to referees, players and spectators.
